text: And when the woman shall stand before the Lord, he shall uncover her head, and shall put on her hands the sacrifice of remembrance and the ablation of jealousy, and he himself shall hold the most bitter waters, whereon he hath heaped curses with execrations.

segments.text: And when the woman shall stand before the Lord, he shall uncover her head, and shall put on her hands the sacrifice of remembrance and the ablation of jealousy, and he himself shall hold the most bitter waters, whereon he hath heaped curses with execrations.
